texts: The enforcement process will now be suspended and the outstanding amount of your PCN will not increase until we have investigated and responded to your representation.
Once we have made a decision you will be sent a letter of acceptance or a notice of rejection.
If we have rejected your representation, the Notice of rejection will outline two options:
